reviews.review_msg: Daniela is great. 340 is a pretty social class, the semester-long group assignment is pretty fun, the lectures involve a lot of discussion and relation to real world examples. Assignments are dead easy, but the midterm is hard. Great for business minors. Cruised to an easy B. If you put in the time this class is definitely not a hard A.
Some lectures were truly great, some a little less than.  Dani works hard and you won't regret taking 340 with her.
Great prof. Super hard marker though! Super helpful!
Rui knows a lot about the subject matter. His experience and cases are amazing. I wish more profs teach like Rui. He only uses his own cases in class and they are so interesting
Typically uses real-world examples which helps give meaning as to why we're learning these things. Easy to approach and ask questions. Great prof overall

Rui is a great professor who does a great job at explaining concepts and how to apply those concepts to real world situations & case studies. Ive learned a lot in this class that I will definitely remember and use. Attending his lectures is important because most of his exam and assignment marking criteria comes from what he said in class.
Rui is great! Super passionate and gives clear examples. Pay attention to those for your exams! He gives lot of time to work on group projects and honestly the class is not very hard.
She's great. Straight forward lectures, made them engaging enough. Always had enough time to work on everything, clear instructions. cant complain. def recommend.
